snippet: A statement from Professors Carmen Reinhart and Kenneth Rogoff in response to a new paper that cited flaws in their 2010 study, “Growth in a Time of Debt.”
lead_paragraph: A statement from Professors Carmen Reinhart and Kenneth Rogoff in response to a new paper that cited flaws in their 2010 study, “Growth in a Time of Debt.”

headline.main: Full Response From Reinhart and Rogoff
